sql-descriptor.sql: CREATE TABLE CATBTERT( TERT_CORP_CODE VARCHAR(4), TERT_STND_GUBN CHAR(1), TERT_STND_DEGR VARCHAR(10), TERT_SEQ0 NUMBER(5, 0), TERT_TERM_CODE VARCHAR(8), TERT_SPM0_REMK VARCHAR(10), TERT_SHAP_REMK VARCHAR(100), TERT_ADD0_REMK VARCHAR(50), TERT_APPL_GUBN VARCHAR(1), TERT_REMK VARCHAR(200), TERT_UPDT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), TERT_UPDT_DATE VARCHAR(8), TERT_INIT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), TERT_INIT_DATE VARCHAR(8), CONSTRAINT CATBTERT_PK PRIMARY KEY ( TERT_CORP_CODE, TERT_STND_GUBN, TERT_STND_DEGR, TERT_SEQ0 ) )

WITH T01(C01, C02, C03, C04, C05) AS ( SELECT 1, 'CATBTERT' , 'TERT_CORP_CODE', 'VARCHAR', 4 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 2, 'CATBTERT' , 'TERT_STND_GUBN', 'CHAR', 1 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 3, 'CATBTERT' , 'TERT_STND_DEGR', 'VARCHAR', 10 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 4, 'CATBTERT' , 'TERT_SEQ0', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 5, 'CATBTERT' , 'TERT_TERM_CODE', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 6, 'CATBTERT' , 'TERT_SPM0_REMK', 'VARCHAR', 10 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 7, 'CATBTERT' , 'TERT_SHAP_REMK', 'VARCHAR', 100 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 8, 'CATBTERT' , 'TERT_ADD0_REMK', 'VARCHAR', 50 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 9, 'CATBTERT' , 'TERT_APPL_GUBN', 'VARCHAR', 1 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 10, 'CATBTERT' , 'TERT_REMK', 'VARCHAR', 200 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 11, 'CATBTERT' , 'TERT_UPDT_CMAN', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 12, 'CATBTERT' , 'TERT_UPDT_DATE', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 13, 'CATBTERT' , 'TERT_INIT_CMAN', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 14, 'CATBTERT' , 'TERT_INIT_DATE', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.COLUMN_NAME IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END CHK_YN ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COLUMNS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = A.C02 AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.C03 ORDER BY A.C01

WITH T01(C01, C02, C03) AS ( SELECT 1, 'TERT_CORP_CODE', '법인코드' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 2, 'TERT_STND_GUBN', '표준구분' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 3, 'TERT_STND_DEGR', '개정차수 ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 4, 'TERT_SEQ0', 'SEQ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 5, 'TERT_TERM_CODE', 'TERMINAL TYPE 코드' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 6, 'TERT_SPM0_REMK', 'SPM기준' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 7, 'TERT_SHAP_REMK', '형상설명' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 8, 'TERT_ADD0_REMK', '비고' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 9, 'TERT_APPL_GUBN', '적용여부' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 10, 'TERT_REMK', 'REMARK' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 11, 'TERT_UPDT_CMAN', '수정자' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 12, 'TERT_UPDT_DATE', '수정일' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 13, 'TERT_INIT_CMAN', '등록자' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 14, 'TERT_INIT_DATE', '등록일' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,B.TABLE_NAME ,B.COMMENTS ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = #table_name# AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.C02
sql-descriptor.sq: WITH T01 ( TERT_CORP_CODE ,TERT_STND_GUBN ,TERT_STND_DEGR ,TERT_SEQ0 ,TERT_TERM_CODE ,TERT_SPM0_REMK ,TERT_SHAP_REMK ,TERT_ADD0_REMK ,TERT_APPL_GUBN ,TERT_REMK ,TERT_UPDT_CMAN ,TERT_UPDT_DATE ,TERT_INIT_CMAN ,TERT_INIT_DATE ) AS ( #DATA_TEXT# ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.SYS_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN CATBTERT B ON B.TERT_CORP_CODE = A.TERT_CORP_CODE AND B.TERT_STND_GUBN = A.TERT_STND_GUBN AND B.TERT_STND_DEGR = A.TERT_STND_DEGR AND B.TERT_SEQ0 = A.TERT_SEQ0
